roles.name: Godfather
roles.description: The godfather is the leader of the mafia side. He chooses who gets killed by the mafia at night.
roles.perks:
High defense (cannot be killed by Vigilante or Neutral Killing)
Interrogation expert (shows up as innocent to sheriff)

roles.name: Mafioso
roles.description: The mafioso is the maffia’s muscle. He carries out the godfather’s orders. If the mafioso gets roleblocked the godfather will carry out the attack himself.
roles.perks:
Can kill a player on godfathers orders
If godfather dies he gets promoted to godfather

roles.name: Framer
roles.description: The framer is a special mafia role. Framer can frame someone so he shows up as suspicious to the sheriff.
roles.perks:
Able to frame a player so he shows up as sus to sheriff
Gets promoted to mafioso if there is no godfather or mafioso.

roles.name: Janitor
roles.description: The professional cleaner of the mafia clears a crime site. Doing this means the player will not get his role shared when his death is announced at daytime.
roles.perks:
Go with the mafia to the person that gets killed and clean the crimesite.
Gets promoted to mafioso if there is no godfather or mafioso.

roles.name: Sheriff
roles.description: The sheriff is a police officer who secretly interrogates players at night. The player he interrogates shows up as either suspicious or innocent.
roles.perks:
Interrogate players at night to show up sus or inno
Mafioso or Framer shows as suspicious
Godfather and town roles show as innocent

roles.name: Lookout
roles.description: The lookout is a skilled observer. He camps at someone's house at night to see who visited them.
roles.perks:
Able to choose someone’s house to camp
Will see who visits the house of the player they chose

roles.name: Vigilanter
roles.description: A town killing role. A former police officer who still owns a gun. He can shoot someone he thinks is suspicious. If you shoot a towny you commit suicide
roles.perks:
Can shoot 1 player
Cannot shoot on night 1

roles.name: Veteran
roles.description: The veteran is a war vet obsessed with defending their own house. They will shoot anyone visiting them at night.
roles.perks:
When on alert anyone visiting their house gets shot.
Can alert 3 times max

roles.name: Doctor
roles.description: A skilled surgeon able to heal anyone who gets attacked.
roles.perks:
Able to heal a player each night
Has one self-heal

roles.name: Escort
roles.description: Literally a hooker. So hot and sexy that they distract anyone for one night.

roles.name: Retributionist
roles.description: A magical being that can resurrect a dead person back to life.
roles.perks: Able to revive 1 player from the death.

roles.name: Transporter
roles.description: A town role that does literally as the role is named. You can transport 2 players at night. This might save someone’s live or get someone killed
roles.perks: Able to transport himself or other players with someone else at night.

roles.name: Jester
roles.description: The jester is only obsessed with one thing. Getting lynched himself. His goal is to get hanged by the town.
roles.perks:
If he gets hanged (wins) he can choose someone that dies due to guilt of lynching the jester.
The player he chooses cannot be revived.

roles.name: Executioner
roles.description: The executioner hates one town member. He’ll do everything to lynch the innocent town member. Doing so will give him a win.
roles.perks:
High defense (cannot be killed at night by a mafia or vigilante)
Turns into jester if target gets killed at night

roles.name: Witch
roles.description: The witch is a neutral role that can control other players with magic. For example, they can control a mafia member to kill someone else than expected or a vigilante into shooting someone he doesn’t want to shoot.
roles.perks: Able to control other players at night

roles.name: Amnesiac
roles.description: A player that hit his head really badly and forgot his role. He may remember a role of a dead person.

roles.name: Serial killer
roles.description: The serial killer is a psychopathic maniac who only wants one thing: to kill people. He’s really good at it too! Delivering an unstoppable attack to everyone besides the godfather.
roles.perks:
Immune to attacks (mafia, vigilante.)
Can kill anyone at night
Only wins if he’s the last one alive

roles.name: Arsonist
roles.description: The arsonist is another maniac obsessed with fire. He can douse someone’s house every night and ignite the houses whenever he likes.
roles.perks:
Setting someone’s house on fire is unstoppable and a doctor won’t even help
Basic defense, can’t be shot by a vigilante or killed by mafia.

roles.name: Werewolf
roles.description: The werewolf is a man that turns into a wolf at full moon. Rampaging at someone houses (or his own if he doesn’t visit)
roles.perks:
Normal man during a normal night
Turns into a rampaging werewolf at full moon delivering powerful attacks (players can still be healed)

goals.mafia: Kill all players who are not part of the mafia.
goals.neutral: Each neutral role has their own goals
